title: You're Wonderful: a 'by children, for children' book
description: You’re Wonderful is a cute little book encouraging children that they’re wonderful, sweet, bubbly and more... featuring characters such an animated bowl of soup who says ‘you’re super’, and others who are totally ‘bubbly’. You’re Wonderful and its companions, You’re Special and You’re a Star are full of fun and humour, and these inspiring books are saying a cheery hello encouraging little ones that they are indeed special, wonderful and more! ‘by children, for children’
author: Leitaya Macale
